document.discussion_title: Worldpay Group PLC (WPG) Earns Neutral Rating from BNP Paribas
document.topic_text: Tweet Worldpay Group PLC (LON:WPG) ‘s stock had its “neutral” rating restated by equities researchers at BNP Paribas in a research note issued to investors on Monday. They currently have a GBX 290 ($3.73) target price on the stock. BNP Paribas’ price target suggests a potential downside of 3.53% from the company’s current price. Shares of Worldpay Group PLC ( LON:WPG ) opened at 300.10 on Monday. The firm’s 50-day moving average is GBX 290.92 and its 200-day moving average is GBX 280.31. The stock’s market capitalization is GBX 5.97 billion. Worldpay Group PLC has a one year low of GBX 240.00 and a one year high of GBX 320.80. The firm also recently declared a dividend, which will be paid on Tuesday, October 18th. Stockholders of record on Thursday, September 15th will be issued a GBX 0.65 ($0.01) dividend. The ex-dividend date is Thursday, September 15th. This represents a dividend yield of 0.21%. //www.americanbankingnews.com/2016/08/22/worldpay-group-plc-wpg-earns-neutral-rating-from-bnp-paribas/ A number of other research firms also recently issued reports on WPG. Jefferies Group downgraded Worldpay Group PLC to a “hold” rating and dropped their price target for the stock from GBX 340 ($4.38) to GBX 325 ($4.18) in a research note on Thursday, August 11th. Goldman Sachs Group Inc. increased their price objective on Worldpay Group PLC from GBX 350 ($4.51) to GBX 400 ($5.15) and gave the stock a “buy” rating in a research report on Wednesday, August 10th. Barclays PLC increased their price objective on Worldpay Group PLC from GBX 315 ($4.06) to GBX 350 ($4.51) and gave the stock an “overweight” rating in a research report on Wednesday, August 10th. JPMorgan Chase & Co. reaffirmed a “neutral” rating and set a GBX 280 ($3.61) price objective on shares of Worldpay Group PLC in a research report on Wednesday, August 10th. Finally, Credit Suisse Group AG reaffirmed an “outperform” rating and set a GBX 300 ($3.86) price objective on shares of Worldpay Group PLC in a research report on Monday, July 4th. Five equities research analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating and five have issued a buy rating to the company’s stock. Worldpay Group PLC presently has an average rating of “Buy” and a consensus target price of GBX 316.60 ($4.08). Worldpay Group plc is a United Kingdom-based company, which provides a range of technology-led payment products and services. The Company operates through four segments: Global eCom, WPUK, WPUS and Corporate. Global eCom provides a range of payment services, both online and by mobile, to accept, validate and settle payments in approximately 126 currencies across 146 countries, using any one of over 300 payment methods. Receive News & Ratings for Worldpay Group PLC Worldpay Group PLC
